Self.Wiki: Determines the configurations for vertical ascent points in missions.

jumpSpecifyAlt_GoalAlt.Wiki: The target altitude the vertical ascent platform will aim for when you jump. In metres.

jumpSpecifyAlt_GravityScale.Wiki: The gravity percentage to apply during the vertical ascent jump.

jumpSpecifyAlt_PrevSpeedRateH.Wiki: The percentage of horizontal speed to retain upon triggering the vertical ascent.

jumpSpecifyAlt_HorizontalMaxSpeedKMPH.Wiki: The maximum horizontal speed that is retained upon triggering the vertical ascent. In kilometres per hour.

jumpSpecifyAlt_HorizontalMaxAccelMPSS.Wiki: The horizontal acceleration to apply to the user upon triggering the vertical ascent. In metres per second ^ 2.

jumpSpecifyAlt_MiddleInputAngDeg.Wiki: The jump angle that is used upon triggering the vertical ascent, based on the current input upon triggering it.

jumpSpecifyAlt_MaxInputAngDeg.AltName: Maximum Jump Angle based on Input
jumpSpecifyAlt_MaxInputAngDeg.Wiki: The maximum jump angle that is used upon triggering the vertical ascent, based on the current input upon triggering it.
